statements.select: WITH MENULIST (MENU_ID, HIER_ID, MENU_LEVEL, SEQ_NO) AS ( SELECT AA.MENU_ID , CAST(RIGHT('0000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.SORT_SEQ)), 4) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS HIER_ID , 1 AS MENU_LEVEL , CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.SORT_SEQ) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS SEQ_NO FROM UAA.MENUS AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.PARENT_ID IS NULL AND ( CONVERT(VARCHAR, #USER_ID#) = ISNULL(( SELECT VALUE FROM UAA.CODES WHERE PARENT_CODE = 'SYSTEM' AND CODE = 'ADMIN'),'') OR AA.MENU_ID IN ( SELECT MENU_ID FROM UAA.USER_MENUS WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# ) ) UNION ALL SELECT AA.MENU_ID , CAST(BB.HIER_ID + RIGHT('0000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.SORT_SEQ)), 4) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS HIER_ID , BB.MENU_LEVEL + 1 AS MENU_LEVEL , CAST(BB.SEQ_NO + '.' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.SORT_SEQ)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS SEQ_NO FROM UAA.MENUS AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MENULIST BB ON AA.PARENT_ID = BB.MENU_ID WHERE ( CONVERT(VARCHAR, #USER_ID#) = ISNULL(( SELECT VALUE FROM UAA.CODES WHERE PARENT_CODE = 'SYSTEM' AND CODE = 'ADMIN'),'') OR AA.MENU_ID IN ( SELECT MENU_ID FROM UAA.USER_MENUS WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# ) ) ) SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BB.HIER_ID) AS ROW_NO , BB.HIER_ID , REPLICATE(' ', (BB.MENU_LEVEL -1) * 5) + BB.SEQ_NO + '. ' + AA.MENU_NAME AS HIER_NAME , AA.MENU_ID , ISNULL(UM.VIEW_YN,'N') AS VIEW_YN , ISNULL(UM.EDIT_YN,'N') AS EDIT_YN , UM.INS_TIME , UM.INS_USER , U1.USER_NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , UM.UPD_TIME , UM.UPD_USER , U2.USER_NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME FROM UAA.MENUS AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MENULIST BB ON AA.MENU_ID = BB.MENU_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.MENUS CC ON AA.PARENT_ID = CC.MENU_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USER_MENUS UM ON AA.MENU_ID = UM.MENU_ID AND UM.USER_ID = #USER_ID# LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON UM.INS_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON UM.UPD_USER = U2.USER_ID ORDER BY BB.HIER_ID
statements.insert: IF EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM UAA.USER_MENUS WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND MENU_ID = #MENU_ID# ) BEGIN UPDATE UAA.USER_MENUS SET VIEW_YN = #VIEW_YN# , EDIT_YN = #EDIT_YN# , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND MENU_ID = #MENU_ID# END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO UAA.USER_MENUS ( USER_ID, MENU_ID, VIEW_YN, EDIT_YN, INS_TIME, INS_USER ) VALUES ( #USER_ID#, #MENU_ID#, #VIEW_YN#, #EDIT_YN#, GETDATE(), #INS_USER# ) END
